tests.summary: Eligibility message display for 2G/3G MSISDN during customer identification
tests.description: Verify that the system displays a popup message to switch to 5G and grant the bonus for eligible 2G/3G customers
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user is on the Regul section
When the user enters a valid 2G/3G MSISDN for bonus eligibility
Then a popup message should be displayed with the following text: "Switch to 50G and get 50GO of Internet + unlimited calls to Ooredoo + 300 minutes to other networks for 30 days! Valid for one month"

tests.summary: Confirmation message display after successful operation to 5G
